meanings.definition: A general direction in which something is developing or changing.
meanings.sent1: The trends in technology show a shift towards more sustainable practices.
meanings.sent2: She follows the latest trends in fashion magazines.
meanings.sent3: The trends in weather seem to be playing tricks on us lately.
meanings.sent4: The trends in the stock market can be as unpredictable as the weather.
meanings.sent5: Keeping up with the trends in social media can be overwhelming at times.

meanings.sent1: Her outfit perfectly captures the current trends in streetwear.
meanings.sent2: The trends this season include bold colors and oversized accessories.
meanings.sent3: Even pets are now following the trends with their own fashionable accessories.
meanings.sent4: The trends in interior design can transform a space completely.
meanings.sent5: Following trends can be fun, but it's important to stay true to your personal style.
